name: Itsy Bitsy Jumper
description:
The Itsy Bitsy Jumper climbed up the water spout!

Goal

Try to get to the top as many times as you can!

Controls:

  • Aim your Jump left or right by holding A / D or Left / Right Arrow
  • Look for the Highlighted Leaf
  • Jump with Space, W, or Up Arrow
  • Try timing your jumps to the Beat of the Music
  • Each loop gets Faster than the last
  • Avoid Falling Raindrops from the Gloomy Cloud
  • When the Glorious Sun comes out, escape to Spider Heaven!!!

Changelog:

v1.00 - Initial Release!

  • Rhythm Based Jumping And Dodging Gameplay
  • Dynamically Speeding Up Music
  • Hand Drawn Art
  • Original Music And Sound Effects
  • Spider Heaven
  • The Sun
  • Some Leaves
  • And A Bug

v1.01 - Cloud Version

  • Added Cloud support
  • Removed Bug (kept spider)

Made in 48 hours by Sakura Magika for Ludum Dare 50:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/the-itsy-bitsy-jumper/

NOTE: Safari may not play any sound. Please try a different browser.
